properties.scriptContent:
[concat(
  '#!/bin/bash
',
  'set -e

',
  'echo "=== World of Workflows Deployment Configuration ==="\n',
  'echo ""\n\n',
  '# Public release URL - no authentication required\n',
  'STORAGE_ACCOUNT="wowreleases"\n',
  'CONTAINER="latest"\n',
  'BLOB_NAME="latest.zip"\n',
  'STORAGE_SUFFIX="', environment().suffixes.storage, '"\n',
  'PACKAGE_URL="https://$STORAGE_ACCOUNT.blob.$STORAGE_SUFFIX/$CONTAINER/$BLOB_NAME"\n\n',
  'echo "Configuration:"\n',
  'echo "  Storage Account: $STORAGE_ACCOUNT"\n',
  'echo "  Container: $CONTAINER"\n',
  'echo "  Blob Name: $BLOB_NAME"\n',
  'echo "  Storage Suffix: $STORAGE_SUFFIX"\n',
  'echo "  Package URL: $PACKAGE_URL"\n\n',
  'echo "Testing package accessibility..."\n',
  'if curl -f -I -s "$PACKAGE_URL" > /dev/null 2>&1; then\n',
  '  echo "Package is accessible (public blob)"\n',
  'else\n',
  '  echo "ERROR: Package is not accessible at $PACKAGE_URL"\n',
  '  echo ""\n',
  '  echo "Please ensure:"\n',
  '  echo "  1. Blob latest.zip exists in container latest"\n',
  '  echo "  2. Container has public blob access enabled"\n',
  '  echo "  3. Storage account wowreleases is accessible"\n',
  '  exit 1\n',
  'fi\n\n',
  'echo ""\n',
  'echo "Writing outputs to $AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH"\n',
  'cat > "$AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH" <<EOF\n',
  '{ "packageUrl": "', '"$PACKAGE_URL"', ', ',
  '"storageAccount": "', '"$STORAGE_ACCOUNT"', ', ',
  '"container": "', '"$CONTAINER"', ', ',
  '"blobName": "', '"$BLOB_NAME"', ' }\n',
  'EOF\n',
  'echo "=== Configuration Complete ==="\n'
)]

param(
    [string]$ResourceGroupName,
    [string]$WebAppName,
    [string]$SubscriptionId,
    [string]$PackageUrl
)

$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'
$notificationUrl = 'https://wowcentral.azurewebsites.net/deploymentNotification'
$logMessages = @()
$kuduUsername = $null
$kuduPassword = $null

function Log-Message {
    param([string]$Message)
    $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'
    $logEntry = "[$timestamp] $Message"
    Write-Host $Message
    $script:logMessages += $logEntry
}

function Send-Notification {
    param(
        [string]$Status,
        [string]$Error = $null
    )
    
    $payload = @{
        resourceGroup = $ResourceGroupName
        webAppName = $WebAppName
        subscriptionId = $SubscriptionId
        status = $Status
        timestamp = (Get-Date -Format 'o')
        log = ($script:logMessages -join "`n")
        kuduUsername = $script:kuduUsername
        kuduPassword = $script:kuduPassword
        packageUrl = $PackageUrl
    }
    
    if ($Error) {
        $payload.error = $Error
    }
    
    try {
        $body = $payload | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10
        $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $notificationUrl -Method Post -Body $body -ContentType 'application/json' -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
        Write-Host "Notification sent successfully"
    } catch {
        Write-Warning "Failed to send notification: $($_.Exception.Message)"
    }
}

try {
    Log-Message "=== Starting ZIP Deployment Process ==="
    Log-Message "Resource Group: $ResourceGroupName"
    Log-Message "Web App: $WebAppName"
    Log-Message "Package URL: $PackageUrl"
    Log-Message ""

    Log-Message "Testing package URL accessibility..."
    try {
        $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $PackageUrl -Method Head -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction Stop
        Log-Message "SUCCESS: Package is accessible (public blob)"
        Log-Message "Status Code: $($response.StatusCode)"
        Log-Message "Content-Length: $($response.Headers['Content-Length']) bytes"
    } catch {
        Log-Message "ERROR: Cannot access package URL"
        Log-Message "URL: $PackageUrl"
        Log-Message "Error: $($_.Exception.Message)"
        throw "Package URL is not accessible"
    }
    Log-Message ""

    Log-Message "Getting web app publish profile..."
    $xml = [xml](Get-AzWebAppPublishingProfile -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName -Name $WebAppName)
    $script:kuduUsername = $xml.SelectNodes('//publishProfile[@publishMethod="MSDeploy"]/@userName').value
    $script:kuduPassword = $xml.SelectNodes('//publishProfile[@publishMethod="MSDeploy"]/@userPWD').value
    $kuduUrl = "https://$WebAppName.scm.azurewebsites.net"

    Log-Message "Kudu URL: $kuduUrl"
    Log-Message "Kudu Username: $script:kuduUsername"
    Log-Message ""

    # Create credentials
    $base64AuthInfo = [Convert]::ToBase64String([Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetBytes("$($script:kuduUsername):$($script:kuduPassword)"))

    Log-Message "Initiating ZIP deployment via Kudu API..."
    $deployUrl = "$kuduUrl/api/zipdeploy?isAsync=true"

    $headers = @{
        Authorization = "Basic $base64AuthInfo"
        "Content-Type" = "application/json"
    }
    
    $body = @{
        packageUri = $PackageUrl
    } | ConvertTo-Json
    
    Log-Message "Sending deployment request..."
    $deployResponse = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $deployUrl -Method POST -Headers $headers -Body $body -UseBasicParsing
    
    Log-Message "SUCCESS: Deployment initiated"
    Log-Message "Response: $($deployResponse | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 3)"
    Log-Message ""
    
    # Wait for deployment to complete
    Log-Message "Waiting for deployment to complete..."
    $statusUrl = "$kuduUrl/api/deployments/latest"
    $maxAttempts = 60
    $attempt = 0
    
    do {
        Start-Sleep -Seconds 10
        $attempt++
        Log-Message "[Attempt $attempt/$maxAttempts] Checking deployment status..."
        
        try {
            $status = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $statusUrl -Headers @{Authorization = "Basic $base64AuthInfo"} -UseBasicParsing
            Log-Message "  Status Code: $($status.status)"
            Log-Message "  Message: $($status.message)"
            
            if ($status.status -eq 4) {
                Log-Message ""
                Log-Message "SUCCESS: Deployment completed successfully!"
                Send-Notification -Status "Success"
                break
            } elseif ($status.status -eq 3) {
                Log-Message ""
                Log-Message "FAILED: Deployment failed with message: $($status.message)"
                Send-Notification -Status "Failed" -Error $status.message
                throw "Deployment failed"
            }
        } catch {
            Log-Message "  Warning: Status check attempt failed: $($_.Exception.Message)"
        }
    } while ($attempt -lt $maxAttempts)
    
    if ($attempt -ge $maxAttempts) {
        Log-Message "WARNING: Deployment status check timed out after $maxAttempts attempts"
        Log-Message "The deployment may still be in progress. Check the web app manually."
        Send-Notification -Status "Timeout" -Error "Status check timed out after $maxAttempts attempts"
    }

    Log-Message ""
    Log-Message "=== ZIP Deployment Process Completed ==="
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['result'] = 'Success'
    
} catch {
    $errorMsg = "Deployment failed: $($_.Exception.Message)`nStack trace: $($_.ScriptStackTrace)"
    Log-Message $errorMsg
    Send-Notification -Status "Error" -Error $errorMsg
    throw
}
